meanings.definition: Suitable for use in a microwave oven.
meanings.sent1: This popcorn is microwavable, so you can easily make it in the microwave.
meanings.sent2: I bought some microwavable meals for busy days when I don't have time to cook.
meanings.sent3: The microwavable plate danced around in the microwave, eager to be heated up.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and comforting as a microwavable blanket on a chilly night.
meanings.sent5: The idea of a microwavable pillow that stays warm all night sounded like a dream come true.

meanings.definition: Able to be heated in a microwave oven.
meanings.sent1: The leftovers were conveniently microwavable, making reheating a breeze.
meanings.sent2: She always keeps some microwavable snacks in the pantry for quick munching.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed puzzled by the concept of microwavable food magically getting warm.
meanings.sent4: His words were like microwavable popcorn, quickly popping into her mind.
meanings.sent5: The excitement in the room was palpable, like a microwavable meal ready to be enjoyed.
